title: Master Broke His Promise (6R41)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Gollum
Twilight:	5
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Regroup: Exert Gollum 3 times to wound each companion. The move limit for this turn is -1.
Lore:	”'Kill them! Kill them! Kill them both! And then we take the Precious! We be the Master!'”
Rarity:	R
